newsitem.title: ITALY: Minimum rate falls to 7.14 pct at Italy dlr repo.
newsitem.headline: Minimum rate falls to 7.14 pct at Italy dlr repo.

text.p: The minimum rate at today's $4.0 billion Bank of Italy three-month repurchase tender was 7.14 percent against 7.20 percent at the previous three-month tender.
The average indicative rate was 7.17 percent from 7.21 percent at the last foreign currency-denominated repo for $4.0 billion on November 21.

The Bank said the tender was fully subscribed and the funds assigned at a minimum 6.20 forward points above the 1,498.50 lire per dollar floor set by the Bank of Italy. The Bank received 28 bids of which 19 were met in full and three in part.
